item.title: Traefik on Kubernetes with Let's Encrypt & Route53
item.description: Why Traefik? Traefik is a modern dynamic load balancer and reverse proxy, it’s easy to set up, and control and provides lots of options which sit right with our use cases. It integrates with Lets Encrypt to provide SSL termination along with support for service discovery, tracing, and metrics out of the box running on Kubernetes as a small pod. Since when We have been using Traefik since early 2017 on 2 of our clusters as a daemonset Kubernetes object with external DNS to update the worker nodes IP with our DNS provider and used to manually generate and update Lets Encrypt certificate on a Kubernetes secret object.
